sen.j: 扇絵師という職業柄特に顔料に親しんでいた友禅斎は顔料化した染料を用い、扇絵の上品で華やかな文様を自在に描き出す手法で新感覚の小袖を生み出す。
sen.e: As he was particularly familiar with pigments thanks to his occupation of a painter of folding fan, he created nouvell kosode (a kimono with short sleeves worn as underclothing by the upper classes) with the use of dyestuff which was made into pigments as well as the technique which freely draws refined and brilliant patterns of ogi-e (fan painting).

sen.e: After having established his reputation, he went to Kanazawa in the second year of Shotoku by the invitation of Maeda clan, the lord of the Kaga domain, and died there after striving for the development of Kaga Yuzen.
